Class HumanAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • HumanAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MSWAgent

    public class HumanAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements MSWAgent
    A class to implement a human player for the trick-playing card game Moss Side Whist.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Evan Huang

        public HumanAgent()
        Constructor for the HumanAgent Class

    • Method Detail

      • discard

        public Card[] discard()
        This method will be called on the leader agent, after the deal. If the agent is not the leader, it is sufficient to return an empty array.
        Specified by:
        discard in interface MSWAgent

      • playCard

        public Card playCard()
        Agent returns the card they wish to play. A 200 ms timelimit is given for this method
        Specified by:
        playCard in interface MSWAgent
        Returns:
        the Card they wish to play.

      • sayName

        public java.lang.String sayName()
        Returns the Agents name. A 10ms timelimit is given here. This method will only be called once.
        Specified by:
        sayName in interface MSWAgent

      • seeCard

        public void seeCard(Card card,
                    java.lang.String agent)
        Sees an Agent play a card. A 50 ms timelimit is given to this function.
        Specified by:
        seeCard in interface MSWAgent
        Parameters:
        card, - the Card played.
        agent, - the name of the agent who played the card.

      • seeHand

        public void seeHand(java.util.List<Card> hand,
                    int order)
        Starts the round with a deal of the cards. The agent is told the cards they have (16 cards, or 20 if they are the leader) and the order they are playing (0 for the leader, 1 for the left of the leader, and 2 for the right of the leader).
        Specified by:
        seeHand in interface MSWAgent

      • seeResult

        public void seeResult(java.lang.String winner)
        See the result of the trick. A 50 ms timelimit is given to this method. This method will be called on each agent at the end of each trick.
        Specified by:
        seeResult in interface MSWAgent
        Parameters:
        winner, - the player who played the winning card.

      • seeScore

        public void seeScore(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> scoreboard)
        See the score for each player. A 50 ms timelimit is givien to this method
        Specified by:
        seeScore in interface MSWAgent
        Parameters:
        scoreboard, - a Map from agent names to their score.

      • setup

        public void setup(java.lang.String agentLeft,
                  java.lang.String agentRight)
        Tells the agent the names of the competing agents, and their relative position.
        Specified by:
        setup in interface MSWAgent
